DOC.brief_summary: To collect information on pediatric patients receiving Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy (CRT) with permanent biventricular pacing (BVP) as a method of treating chronic heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: CRT Pilot Study for Children With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Chronic and severe heart failure, NYHA class III or IV Pts optimized and stable on diuretics and afterload reducing agents (with or without inotropes) for at least 1 week prior to enrollment Chronic systemic ventricular dysfunction as defined in the protocol.
